newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 17 muni bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 17 muni bond issues for insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said Tuesday it qualified for bond insurance the following 17 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Atkins School District No 18, Ark., $3.04 million refunding bonds.
--Monterey County, Calif., $9 million certificates of participation, by direct purchase.
--Massachusetts Water Resources Authority $150 million revenue bonds.
--Warren Building Authority, Mich., $10.99 million revenue bonds.
--Owatonna Independent School District No 761, Minn., $29.9 million GOs.
--New Hanover County, N.C., $14.8 million GO public improvement bonds.
--Vance County, N.C., $6.745 million school building refunding GOs.
--Baldwin Union Free School District, N.Y., $9.8 million GOs.
--Richland County School District No 2, S.C., $19.7 million GOs.
--Williamson County, Tenn., $23.34 million GO public improvement and rural school bonds.
